Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、あんたはハーフの事を 知っていたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, did you know about Halfs at all?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、多少はな……。だが、おまえたち同様、 <Hilda>に会うまで、実際には……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, somewhat... However, just like you, before meeting <Hilda> I had never met one firsthand...

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフは体が弱く、幼くして亡くなる子が 多いと聞いた事がある……
Entry.EnglishText: I had heard that the constitutions of Halfs were weak, and that many of them die in their adolescence...

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう意味では、<Hilda>やミリッツァは、 幸せな子だと俺は思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: So in that sense, I think it's a miracle that <Hilda> and Militsa are alive.
